thread.title: Sean Spicer challenged about White House media ban - BBC News
thread.title_full: Sean Spicer challenged about White House media ban - BBC News

title: Sean Spicer challenged about White House media ban - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Sean Spicer challenged about White House media ban 25 February 2017 Last updated at 07:50 GMT 
The White House has barred several major media organisations including the BBC, CNN, the New York Times from attending an informal press briefing, with no reason given. 
When asked why some were excluded, White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer said it was his decision to "expand the pool" of reporters. Read more
